trends: There have been no other sightings in Avondale
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was at home checking e-mail. the north window was to my left and something bright caught my eye. i turned to look and saw the bright orange\pink light moving toward the north. i stood up and leaned toward the window to get a better look. the brightness, color and shape never changed. i knew it was not an airplane at that point. it moved in a deliberate direction from south to north. i first saw it at about 45* above the horizon and it vanished less than 45 seconds later at 20* or less above the horizon. it was not blocked by anything. it just simply vanished suddenly. i was confused at first and then, i was more or less stunned. i had never seen anything that looked like this before. i remained confused and awed by this even after it was gone from sight. the object just vanished very abruptly.
Summary: Viewed from North window. Moving North slowly. Very bright, dark orange/pink. Defined circular shape. Vanished instantly.
